text: Laura Bell Bundy (born April 10, 1981) is an American actress and singer. She performed in many Broadway roles. She played Amber Von Tussle in the stage version of Hairspray. She played Elle Woods in the stage version of Legally Blonde. Bundy was born in Lexington, Kentucky. She was also raised there. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Kentucky Category:1981 births Category:Living people
title: Laura Bell Bundy
